The word لَا comes from the root ل ا and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.
data.sentence: The word وَقَالُوا comes from the root ق و ل and is associated with the meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.

data.meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.
data.sentence: The word ءَالِهَتَكُمْ comes from the root ا ل ه and is associated with the meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.

data.meanings: to leave/forsake/neglect, fall upon, wound, cut in slices, let, desist.
data.sentence: The word تَذَرُنَّ comes from the root و ذ ر and is associated with the meanings: to leave/forsake/neglect, fall upon, wound, cut in slices, let, desist.

data.meanings: to love, wish for, desire, be fond of, will, long.
data.sentence: The word وَدًّا comes from the root و د د and is associated with the meanings: to love, wish for, desire, be fond of, will, long.

data.meanings: to let run free, pasture freely, be lost. sa'atun - while, present time, distance, hour, time.
data.sentence: The word سُوَاعًا comes from the root س و ع and is associated with the meanings: to let run free, pasture freely, be lost. sa'atun - while, present time, distance, hour, time.

data.meanings: to remove, take off, scrape, rubout, pack, tear with the beak. nasran - eagle/vulture, idol in the shape of an eagle.
data.sentence: The word وَنَسْرًا comes from the root ن س ر and is associated with the meanings: to remove, take off, scrape, rubout, pack, tear with the beak. nasran - eagle/vulture, idol in the shape of an eagle.
